action.action-desc: Mr. Jackson of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to rescind guidelines and ensure the removal of signs and guidance relating to the COVID–19 pandemic.

section.header: Termination of Department of Veterans Affairs COVID–19 guidelines
section.text: The Secretary of Veterans Affairs shall immediately—

paragraph.text: rescind any and all guidelines relating to the COVID–19 pandemic; and
ensure the removal of all signs and posted guidance related to COVID–19 at Department of Veterans Affairs facilities, including those regarding masking and social distancing.
